item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Proof of location for online polls (16 points | 5 comments)
2. The Rise and Fall of the English Sentence (2017) (31 points | 4 comments)
3. How rqlite is tested (11 points | 2 comments)
4. Google’s OAuth login doesn’t protect against purchasing a failed startup domain (332 points | 168 comments)
5. Diets high in advanced glycation end products promote insulin resistance (25 points | 17 comments)
6. Show HN: WASM-powered codespaces for Python notebooks on GitHub (67 points | 10 comments)
7. Hotel booking sites overcharge Bay Area customers (130 points | 76 comments)
8. Servo vs. steppers: Speed, Torque and Accuracy [video] (92 points | 31 comments)

10. Show HN: Value likelihoods for OpenAI structured output (33 points | 13 comments)
11. Apple will soon receive 'made in America' chips from TSMC's Arizona fab (334 points | 267 comments)
12. Reversible computing escapes the lab (177 points | 38 comments)

15. Executive order on advancing United States leadership in AI infrastructure (92 points | 60 comments)

21. Show HN: A daily digest for reMarkable (39 points | 25 comments)

26. Webtop – Alpine,Ubuntu,Fedora,and Arch containers containing full desktop envs (315 points | 61 comments)
27. Nix – Death by a Thousand Cuts (146 points | 70 comments)
28. The DevOps Engineer's Handbook (88 points | 4 comments)
29. ZFS 2.3 released with ZFS raidz expansion (338 points | 240 comments)
30. Ask HN: How do you prevent the impact of social media on your children? (99 points | 104 comments)
